answers.answer: Welcome to the gastroenterology community!  I think that this could be a bug or it could be related to the diet.  You might want to try stopping the diet to see if that helps your symptoms.
You may also want to get sugar levels checked do you feel okay before you eat ?

This does sound like your blood sugar levels are off.  They may be spiking or dropping too low after a meal causing your symptoms.  It may be something in the food, but I would see your doctor in case this is a blood sugar issue.

Thank you for all of your help! I feel ok before I eat, its just after I eat those meals it seems like! Diabetes (im not sureon the spelling) runs in my family. I do not think I am a diabetic. However I might be sensitive to those kind of things

question: I have been on the nutrisystem diet for about a month. However just recently, I have been feeling really funny after I eat one of their meals. I am not sure if it is because of the food, or if it just me.Right after I eat, I get really gasy, and tired, sometimes dizzy. I also have a stomach ache, and sometimes loose bowels. (but that doesn't happen everytime)Do I just have a stomach bug? Or something more serious? And no, the food is not expired.
title: Not feeling well after I eat- HEALTHY!
